title: Alt Mobility appoints Pankaj Gupta as chief growth officer
description: Alt Mobility has appointed Pankaj Gupta as its new chief growth officer. With extensive experience in the EV sector, Gupta will lead the company's expansion into new markets, particularly in retail leasing. He aims to enhance access to cleaner transportation and energy across various user segments, including fleets and first-time users.
